title: Plate
description: hexagonally lobed faience plate with brown glaze border and subsidiary decorative ripple effect in body of plate; center is filled with a casual arrangement of flowers a large carmine carnation, blue field daisies, buttercups and a purple parrot tulip; small sprays of fleurs fines on border
creditline: Gift of Mrs. John P. Rutherfurd in Memory of her father Mr. Thomas Shevlin
